title: Apple's Vision Pro will test Tim Cook's legacy as an innovator
text: Premium © The Financial Times Limited 2024. All Rights Reserved. Not to be redistributed, copied or modified in any way. Apple released its Vision Pro headset to consumers in the US on Friday, in a test of chief executive Tim Cook's ability to create a groundbreaking product with mass appeal that can power a new phase of growth at the tech giant. The device is the iPhone maker's biggest product launch since the Apple Watch nearly a decade ago. But the Vision Pro is the chief executive's boldest project since he was promoted to lead the company shortly before co-founder Steve Jobs' death in 2011. Ad-free access
